summary: This is an email forwarding a supplemental letter regarding anticipated testimony, sent by attorney Laura Menninger to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, with copies to other legal professionals. The letter concerns Mr. Flatley and a rebuttal expert.

persons.name: Mr. Flatley

events.title: Email regarding supplemental testimony letter
events.description: Laura Menninger sends an email to the U.S. Attorney's Office forwarding a supplemental letter about Mr. Flatley's anticipated testimony and a rebuttal expert.

keyFacts: Attorney Laura Menninger sent a supplemental letter regarding Mr. Flatley's anticipated testimony to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The correspondence involves a rebuttal expert related to the testimony.
The email was sent on November 27, 2021, and forwarded the next day.
Multiple legal professionals (Jeff Pagliuca, Ann Lundberg, Nicole Simmons) were copied on the communication.
The document is part of legal correspondence in the Epstein case, focusing on testimony preparation.
